item.description:
The Brettl-Hupfers will be at our lodge in Bartlett, NH this weekend for an exciting weekend of Championship Ski Racing and discount tickets to Wildcat. On race day, March 14th, racers and guests of the club can get their lift tickets for only $39!

Guests are welcome at the club for $20/night guest fees. We are only 2 miles from Attitash and within 20 minutes of Wildcat & Black Mountain with Bretton Woods and Cranmore also close by. With the great conditions we've had this year and discount tickets at Wildcat this is not a weekend to miss.

Directions and additional information will be forwarded to those who RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Come on in - we'll be there
item.name: Weekend at the Bretts, March 13 - March 15; Discount Wildcat Tickets!
